data.title: Social Media Link Partners with Bazaarvoice to Take Retail Reviews to the Next Level for Brands
data.summary: [PR Newswire] - NEW YORK, Sept. 13, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Social Media Link (SML), the leader in online advocacy activation for brands, announced today a new partnership with Bazaarvoice, Inc. (BV), the consumer-generated content solution provider creating the world's smartest shopper network. Through this partnership, Social Media Link offers seamless integration to help marketers drive authentic product reviews that foster sales directly into Bazaarvoice's powerful syndication engine, which shares consumer-generated content between 3,000 global brand and retail websites in the company's network.
